column4: Mouse Cursor is eraseing the screen as it moves.  (H/W: Via Chrome9). Verified in 7.10 and 8.04.  Seemed to work in 8.04beta4.  Looking to track down where the problem may be.  Experiened with xorg.conf editing, and Xorg driver compilation.
BTW, are we allowed to reask questions?  It is a busy channel,
